short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate Test Automation! Use this extension to generate a list of potential web element definitions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Right click on an element, and select 'Generate and copy selectors' in the context menu. You will receive a prompt of what to name the element in the auto generated C# IWebElement definitions - simply enter some text, submit, and check your clipboard! 

The extension will copy a list of human readable css selectors that can be used to identify your element using selenium web driver, alongside showing how many elements will be returned by each selector.

This extension currently only works on abelandcole hosts.
